title: Never knew LOL is having such a hard time.
body: Ye right. Faking hours spent in queue lol ru serious riot? Making op champs on every faking patch wasn't enough for them huh? I bet the riot is the real troll. Just a simple blind pick match, waits like douche 50 mins just for a lvl 29 match. I thought riot had millions players, at least thousands under plat. What's wrong with dis r%%%%%ed queue.

replies.body: Lol, because you didn't type fuck i thought you were saying that riot was somehow fake(ing)  how long people were in que. Its got millions of players at level 30 not 29 and more than half are in bronze or silver.
If a queue starts to take too long, restart it. It sometimes bugs out and causes it to drop from the queue without actually displaying that
I used to be 1-2 for general, 5-7 min for maximum for every queue. I just don't get dis s6 shit.
